scripts.dev: node -e "console.log('Web dev server running on http://localhost:3000'); setInterval(() => {}, 1000)"
scripts.test:watch: node -e "console.log('Running web tests in watch mode...'); setInterval(() => {}, 1000)"
scripts.watch: node -e "console.log('Watching web files for changes...'); setInterval(() => {}, 1000)"
scripts.serve: node -e "console.log('Serving web app on http://localhost:8080'); setInterval(() => {}, 1000)"
